ai-patthana16.59:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.59:1.1_0: Rebirth is not a cause of defilement. Relying on the teaching, there is no cause or condition for the corruption of delusion.
ai-patthana16.59:1.1_1: Rebirth is not a cause of defilement. Practicing for the Teaching, not for the reason.’
ai-patthana16.59:1.1_2: Rebirth is unhindered, gives rise to confidence in those without it. Relying on the cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.59:2.1_0: Neither nonsensical nor a mass of bathing, the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom.
ai-patthana16.59:2.1_1: Attached to a non-returner, not coming back to the beginning of the past. Lord of Death is a condition for the sake of baselessness. ...
